channel.title: Rs2 Network dev. Team (HURRY & JOIN)
channel.description:
Rs2 Network is now having some problems, and now the problems would be that we are ready to hire more, delete few, and get new ppl (but maybe not deleteing anyone :| ) yeah, so to join, first of all you need the info, and heres the link:
http://www.freewebs.com/grimreaperisland/Staff%5FMembers.html
^the following link above had the info, now to join all u need to do is post here. (LOOKING FOR TALENTED SKILLED PPL, NO POSERS OR NOOBS) (want to show proof to get a higher chance of getting pick, then go for it.)
one last thing, we will give Co-Co-Owner position for any one that is good with PHP and wants to help us (so far we have one that is having dificulties, any one else that can help?)

item.title: Rs2 Network dev. Team (HURRY & JOIN)
item.dc:creator: @muubo muubo
item.description:
@muubo wrote:

wow i finally found one of ur posts reaper i checked pms and it said error board removed so i found this one so ill post here and tomorrow when i wake up all add it to that freewebs site

User: Juvenile First Name: Shaunn Age: 16 very close to 17 Position: server tester Why: i play games alot and would like to help test Experience I have: i build servers for runescape and knight online (private servers) and i think its fun to code them so now i will just have fun playing games instead. Example: my knight online server (JVKO), i coded for my friends Knight online server (Vko) and i have done many other knight online servers on my own that i shut down JVKO was my most recent and it ended up going down until i get about 100$ usd to bring it back up with new database and client More Proof (optional): Other that will help me get picked: as said before i want to take time away from coding on knight online servers and playing knight online servers and try something new. How much time can I spend a day: 6+ hours Country I live in: USA

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Network dev. Team (HURRY & JOIN)
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:12, topic:129044”][quote author=rs w00dcut link=topic=179662.msg1643073#msg1643073 date=1185955517]
hmm.okay i checked it out…thx for not breaking…some nubs don’t know tho
[/quote]
Must I say this again? When they post their forums, they are using the forums in the development of their server, they are not attempting to build up a community that could possibly, one day, threaten Moparscape, and so, it is not against the rules. I’d really like for you to stop being a wannabe mod, it’s getting pretty annoying.[/quote]
Rofl, pretty true, thanks sick, =]

omgwtfbbq:

So does that mean I get the part? PM me with some info about the setting (coords please) What I mean is will the server be in varrock? Karamja? Things like that so I can start making shops.

This server is going to be almost all the map. Its almost close to complete, rofl but not yet. ohh we made this special place for mods, so… yo can help with that, =] (i made a pwnage portal, well i didn’t make it, I added it, rofl) pm u later when ur on, ohh the website right now (yeah is a little lame) is rs2network.co.nr (sorry, this is the curretn one, right now… new one later)

Read full topic

When they post their forums, they are using the forums in the development of their server, they are not attempting to build up a community that could possibly, one day, threaten Moparscape, and so, it is not against the rules. item.title: Rs2 Network dev. Team (HURRY & JOIN)
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

[quote=“omgwtfbbq, post:7, topic:129044”][quote author=Owner Reaper link=topic=179662.msg1643055#msg1643055 date=1185955119]
Rs2 Network is now having some problems, and now the problems would be that we are ready to hire more, delete few, and get new ppl (but maybe not deleteing anyone ) yeah, so to join, first of all you need the info, and heres the link:

http://www.freewebs.com/grimreaperisland/Staff_Members.html

^the following link above had the info, now to join all u need to do is post here. (LOOKING FOR TALENTED SKILLED PPL, NO POSERS OR NOOBS) (want to show proof to get a higher chance of getting pick, then go for it.)

one last thing, we will give Co-Co-Owner position for any one that is good with PHP and wants to help us (so far we have one that is having dificulties, any one else that can help?)
[/quote]

I could do either shops or server testing… Or both O.o

Or I could be a mod/admin… I’m trusted to be one on a few of the servers I play on.[/quote]
I think shops would do, because if ur a admin, u can test =]

[quote=“eolia123, post:8, topic:129044”]cool cool, im real good with php… ive played f2p for 2 years n php for 2 so if u need a co co owner just hollar at me :P[/quote] php is like java, a coding language, but for websites… Its not p2p, u said u play f2p and php, I bet u meant p2p… =P

[quote=“omgwtfbbq, post:10, topic:129044”][quote author=laurens800 link=topic=179662.msg1644150#msg1644150 date=1185993738]
sorry to say but the site is gay… and also if you want people on your site buy one,.,
[/quote]
Why when you can get a mini-site free?[/quote] Yeah laurens, u show off, a mini free site is ok, for right now. Then when I get someone good with php, I’ll make a real site, -.-

Read full topic
